title: Community Run Events
body:
Hey folks!

So thought I would make a quick discussion on the topic of community run events, such as tournaments, viewing parties and meetups.

Have you ever attended one? If so where was it and what were the things you liked/disliked about it? If you have never attended a community run event, how come? Also, what are things you would love to see at a community run event?

This is just a great place to say what you want and also for those who are wanting to run some events to get an idea of what people want to see.

replies.body: Never been to one, mainly bcz none are in goullburn, id like to see some tournaments,after partys etc

Hey man! 

If there are no tournaments/events in your area why not host one?

Check out our new events portal: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

I'm here to help as well if this is something you're interested in.

Beat me to the suggestion!

Goulburn is about an hours drive from Canberra, yeah? I know there are quite a few League players from that area that I'm sure would come to an event if you host one! Plus players from all around that area. Riot are awesome at helping out if you want to run an event of some sort. I highly recommend it!

it can be anything, a tournament at a local internet cafe, a viewing party for some OPL stuff at a hall/bar, even just a catch up to chat League stuff. They can be fun and it's a great way to meet like-minded community members!
